--- title: "KIND network update" format: html editor_options: chunk_output_type: console execute: echo: false message: false --- ```{=html} ``` ## Week beginning Mon 27th January 2025 Dear colleagues, Welcome to our regular weekly update. Last week we launched a new puzzle of the week segment, with a simple-ish technical puzzle about extracting dates from text. Please keep an eye out for next week's challenge, which will be about recognising and standardising abbreviations. Brendan --- ## Wins of The Week In the spirit of [#IAmRemarkable](https://www.rmrkblty.org/iamremarkable), we do a weekly wins of the week thread to celebrate the professional (and personal) achievements of the community: + Managed to run a dashboard without activating a "rapid unscheduled disassembly" event + Been accepted to start a PGCert next week. All hail being a student again! + I completed a really complicated report using GIS as well as R syntax. Requester was very happy with the result. + Crafted some custom functions to solve the puzzle of the week every day Well done all, and looking forward to [hearing your wins of the week](https://forms.office.com/e/8DgpNP6rcK) in future. --- ## Training sessions Please note that we've changed the way that our training events are set-up. You should now be able to click the session link to add yourself directly to the session. `````{=html}

Intro to predictive models in R 13:00-14:30 Thu 30th January 2025 R ðŸŒ¶ :beginner-level
````` ## Events 1-2pm, Tue 28th January 2025. The Scottish Community of Data Analysts is a community of practice for those working with data in territorial NHS Boards. Next week, the presenter will be [Nora Villamil Buenrostro - Factors impacting on efficient operation of a Day Surgery Unit](https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3a109a603c446743308bff6588820372a9%40thread.tacv2/1671457631308?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%2210efe0bd-a030-4bca-809c-b5e6745e499a%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%2284150c3d-baed-4515-8eee-8f13ed0d9650%22%7d).25th 01 2815 30.00. The KIND community meetup is our regular social learning event. Next week, the presenter will be [Richard Hassett (NHS GGC) - R medication adherence](kcm$Link). ## Book of the week character(0). character(0). *character(0)*.
